title: Quality Design Websites
content: Does anyone know any good design/font sites that have QUALITY vector illustrations on like 'YouWorkForThem.com', NOT dull corporate ones like istock?
author: Munya Chidakwa

comments.content: iStockPhoto does have many corporate-type photos and vectors, but their overall selection is vastly larger than YouWorkForThem. Have you tried using their search filters (on the left side when you do a search)?
Yes i have. I wanted to see if there where alternative websites to broaden my options
